thread.title: Fans vote Liberty's Doug Erney as Lehigh Valley's best QB
thread.title_full: Fans vote Liberty's Doug Erney as Lehigh Valley's best QB

title: Fans vote Liberty's Doug Erney as Lehigh Valley's best QB
text:
Liberty quarterback Doug Erney scans the Parkland defense. (Sue Beyer | For lehighvalleylive.com) By Greg Joyce | For lehighvalleylive.com on October 21, 2015 3:07 PM 
The final votes have been tallied and the fans have selected Liberty 's Doug Erney as the Lehigh Valley's best quarterback . 
The senior collected 32.4 percent of the vote to edge out a crosstown rival in Freedom 's Joe Young (30.1 percent). 
While leading the Hurricanes to a 6-1 start this year, Erney is 76 of 133 passing for 1,250 yards, 18 touchdowns and one interception while adding 75 carries for 455 yards and five touchdowns. He recently broke the school record for career touchdown passes and passing yards. 
Stay tuned for the next fan vote where we'll turn it over to the defense.
